Maybe it'll work this time?

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

##This is a plot
```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 7, message=FALSE}
mpg %>% 
  group_by(year, class) %>% 
  summarise(mpg = mean(hwy)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, mpg, color = class)) + 
  geom_line()
```
